title: Jadeitor's Art Gallery
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image http://borradores-scp-es-2.wdfiles.com/local--files/jadeitor/SCPBanner1.jpg]]

[[div style="border:solid 10px #ffffff; background:#FF7171; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ WELCOME TO MY GALLERY

I've been an illustrator for over a decade and during my free time I like to set aside my work as an artist to draw stuff I like for my own enjoyment. With time I'll be updating this gallery with more content.  

-- //Jade P.N.G(Jadeitor)//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

------

+ LAST UPDATE//

[[=image http://borradores-scp-es-2.wdfiles.com/local--files/jadeitor/SCP4975.jpg size="medium"]]
